file_content.text:
OFFICIAL REQUEST GSI Biological Services
Galactic Solutions Industries, the galaxy's leader in a vast array of military applications of technological services, seeks a willing researcher to explore the surface of Ziost. Specifically, we would like to examine the catastrophic event's effects had on sentient life at a genetic level. By recording the location and genetic makeup of the event's unfortunate victims and providing the data to GSI, you will provide essential insight into a global tragedy. GSI will gladly compensate you for your findings.
GSI: We stay neutral, so you don't have to.

Complete the following daily missions on Ziost within a week:
[DAILY] Death of a World [DAILY] Eyes into the Past [DAILY] From Ashes [DAILY] Looking for Signs [DAILY] Dead Pulse

Aid in diminishing the former Sith Emperor's power by defeating the following enemies in any difficulty mode:
[Operation: Heart of Ruin] Defeat the Colossal Monolith (Any Difficulty Mode)
Defeat the Worldbreaker Monolith
[Recommended Gear] Story Mode: Item Rating 186 Hard Mode: Item Rating 192

Aid in diminishing the former Sith Emperor's power by defeating the following enemies in any difficulty mode:
[Operation: Heart of Ruin] Defeat the Colossal Monolith (Any Difficulty Mode)
Defeat the Worldbreaker Monolith
[Recommended Gear] Story Mode: Item Rating 186 Hard Mode: Item Rating 192
